mapper.sql: ID, AMPUTATED, APPRAISE_STATE, APPRAISE_TIME,COMPLETE_RATE,CREATED_DATE_TIME, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME,FEEDBACK_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME,PERSON_NAME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, MATTERS, ORGANIZATION_Id,ORGANIZATION_NAME, PHONE, SATISFACTION, WINDOW_NO,EMPLOYEES_NAME,EMPLOYEES_NO, RESOURCE_ID
mapper.select: select fi.ID, fi.PERSON_NAME, fi.PHONE, fi.ORGANIZATION_ID, fi.ORGANIZATION_NAME, fi.WINDOW_NO, fi.EMPLOYEES_NO, fi.EMPLOYEES_NAME, fi.MATTERS, fi.FEEDBACK_TIME, fi.APPRAISE_STATE, fi.APPRAISE_TIME, fi.SATISFACTION, fi.COMPLETE_RATE, fi.DEADLINE from FEEDBACK_INFO fi where fi.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into FEEDBACK_INFO (ID, AMPUTATED, COMPLETE_RATE, CREATED_DATE_TIME, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME, EMPLOYEES_NAME, FEEDBACK_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, MATTERS, ORGANIZATION_NAME, PHONE, SATISFACTION, WINDOW_NO) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{completeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedbackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matters,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{satisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{windowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into FEEDBACK_INFO
ID,
AMPUTATED,
COMPLETE_RATE,
CREATED_DATE_TIME,
CREATED_USER_ID,
CREATED_USER_NAME,
EMPLOYEES_NAME,
FEEDBACK_TIME,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME,
LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID,
LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME,
MATTERS,
ORGANIZATION_NAME,
PHONE,
SATISFACTION,
WINDOW_NO,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{completeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{employeesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{feedbackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{matters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{satisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{windowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update FEEDBACK_INFO
AMPUTATED = #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPLETE_RATE = #{completeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEES_NAME = #{employeesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_TIME = #{feedbackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID = #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATTERS = #{matters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_NAME = #{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SATISFACTION = #{satisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WINDOW_NO = #{windowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update FEEDBACK_INFO set AMPUTATED = #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPLETE_RATE = #{completeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPLOYEES_NAME = #{employeesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_TIME = #{feedbackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID = #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATTERS = #{matters,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_NAME = #{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SATISFACTION = #{satisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WINDOW_NO = #{windowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select count(FEEDBACK_TIME) from FEEDBACK_INFO where to_char(FEEDBACK_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{feedbackTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by FEEDBACK_TIME
select path from ORGANIZATION where id= #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT count ,s.MATTERS as QL_NAMES FROM (SELECT count(fi.MATTERS) as count ,fi.MATTERS from FEEDBACK_INFO fi GROUP BY MATTERS ORDER BY count(MATTERS) desc)s where ROWNUM<7

select fi.ID, fi.PERSON_NAME, fi.PHONE, fi.ORGANIZATION_ID, fi.ORGANIZATION_NAME, fi.EMPLOYEES_NO, fi.FEEDBACK_TIME, fi.APPRAISE_STATE, fi.SATISFACTION, fi.COMPLETE_RATE, emp.NAME as EMPLOYEES_NAME from FEEDBACK_INFO fi left join ORGANIZATION organ on fi.ORGANIZATION_ID = organ.ID and organ.AMPUTATED=0 left join EMPLOYEES emp on emp.EMPLOYEE_NO=fi.EMPLOYEES_NO and emp.AMPUTATED=0
fi.PERSON_NAME like '%'||#{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
CONCAT(organ.PATH,',') like '%'||#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
fi.EMPLOYEES_NO like '%'||#{employeesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
fi.AMPUTATED=0

select fi.ID, fi.PERSON_NAME, fi.PHONE, fi.ORGANIZATION_ID, fi.ORGANIZATION_NAME, fi.EMPLOYEES_NO, fi.FEEDBACK_TIME, fi.APPRAISE_STATE, fi.SATISFACTION, fi.COMPLETE_RATE, emp.NAME as EMPLOYEES_NAME from FEEDBACK_INFO fi left join ORGANIZATION organ on fi.ORGANIZATION_ID = organ.ID and organ.AMPUTATED=0 left join EMPLOYEES emp on emp.EMPLOYEE_NO=fi.EMPLOYEES_NO and emp.AMPUTATED=0
fi.PERSON_NAME like '%'||#{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
CONCAT(organ.PATH,',') like '%'||#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
fi.EMPLOYEES_NO like '%'||#{employeesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and
to_char(fi.FEEDBACK_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') BETWEEN #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
fi.AMPUTATED=0

SELECT
from FEEDBACK_INFO fi LEFT JOIN EVALUATION_RESULTS er ON fi.PHONE = er.APPRAISER_MOBILE where ER.COUNTER_CODE = #{windowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND O.ORGANIZATION_NO = #{organizationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY fi.FEEDBACK_TIME desc

select fi.ID, fi.PERSON_NAME, fi.PHONE, fi.ORGANIZATION_ID, fi.ORGANIZATION_NAME, fi.WINDOW_NO, fi.EMPLOYEES_NO, fi.EMPLOYEES_NAME, fi.MATTERS, fi.FEEDBACK_TIME, fi.APPRAISE_STATE, fi.APPRAISE_TIME, fi.SATISFACTION, fi.COMPLETE_RATE from FEEDBACK_INFO fi where fi.APPRAISE_TIME is null and to_char((sysdate-2),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') <= to_char(fi.FEEDBACK_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')

select count(*) from FEEDBACK_INFO fi
and fi.ORGANIZATION_NAME like '%'||#{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and fi.SATISFACTION = 0

select count(*) from FEEDBACK_INFO fi
and fi.ORGANIZATION_NAME like '%'||#{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and fi.SATISFACTION = 1

select count(*) from FEEDBACK_INFO fi
and fi.ORGANIZATION_NAME like '%'||#{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and fi.COMPLETE_RATE = 1

select count(*) from FEEDBACK_INFO fi
and fi.ORGANIZATION_NAME like '%'||#{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and fi.COMPLETE_RATE = 2

select count(*) from FEEDBACK_INFO fi
and fi.ORGANIZATION_NAME like '%'||#{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'

SELECT count(1) FROM FEEDBACK_INFO WHERE AMPUTATED = 0 AND APPRAISE_STATE = 1 AND TO_CHAR ( sysdate, 'yyyy-mm' ) = TO_CHAR ( FEEDBACK_TIME, 'yyyy-mm' ) AND ORGANIZATION_ID=#{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT count( 1 ) FROM FEEDBACK_INFO WHERE AMPUTATED = 0 AND APPRAISE_STATE = 1 AND SATISFACTION = 0 AND TO_CHAR ( sysdate, 'yyyy-mm' ) = TO_CHAR ( FEEDBACK_TIME, 'yyyy-mm' ) and ORGANIZATION_ID=#{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select fi.ID, fi.ONE_DETAIL, fi.TWO_DETAIL FROM FEEDBACK_INFO fi WHERE AMPUTATED = 0 AND APPRAISE_STATE = 1 AND SATISFACTION = 1 AND TO_CHAR ( sysdate, 'yyyy-mm' ) = TO_CHAR ( FEEDBACK_TIME, 'yyyy-mm' ) and ORGANIZATION_ID=#{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT ID FROM FEEDBACK_INFO WHERE AMPUTATED = 0 AND TO_CHAR ( sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) = TO_CHAR ( FEEDBACK_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) AND ORGANIZATION_ID=#{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select count (1) from FEEDBACK_INFO where WINDOW_NO = #{windowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT FI.EMPLOYEES_NO,FI.SATISFACTION,FI.COMPLETE_RATE,FI.APPRAISE_STATE,FI.FEEDBACK_TIME FROM FEEDBACK_INFO fi WHERE FI.APPRAISE_STATE=1 AND FI.FEEDBACK_TIME BETWEEN (select trunc(add_months(sysdate,-1),'mm') from dual) AND (SELECT (sysdate) FROM dual)
